name: Midgard (itch)
description:
This game was made by 5 Seniors as a Senior Design Project submission. It represents a semester's worth of work. 

Midgard is an semi-open world 3rd person RPG with action and storytelling elements.

Set in a alternative history 19th century London where Norse mythology became the dominant religion, the player takes the role of a reincarnated warrior who had died and gone to Valhalla only to be brought back to work for the gods once more.

Complete quests, fight enemies, and wield the power of the gods to find a way to prevent Ragnarok.

W A S D - Movement Controls

Space - Jump

(hold) Shift - Sprint

X - Draw/Stow Melee Weapon

E - Swing Melee Weapon

Q - Draw and fire ranged weapon

F - Activate Powerup Ability (increases ranged damage)

Artstation Breakdown - https://www.artstation.com/artwork/aGGmZ0

GitHub Repository - https://github.com/wymsic/MIDGARD

Team (un)Lucky 13

  • Scripting, Level, & Sound Design: John Chambers
  • Lead Artist & 2D Artist: Nat Hadaway
  • Lead Writer, Narrative Design, & Questing: Hugo Lopez
  • Music & Documentation: Nate Carpenter
  • 3D Modeling & Character Design: Hunter Robertson
